SUMMARY: REQUIRED | OPTIONAL DETAIL: ELEMENT

com.alexgilleran.icesoap.annotation
Annotation Type XMLField

@Retention(value=RUNTIME)
@Target(value=FIELD)
public @interface XMLField

Indicates a field within an IceSoap POJO that is to be automatically set from an XML object - accepts an absolute or relative XPath to map the field to an XML text element. Note that this can take the form of an absolute XPath or a relative XPath - relative XPaths are relative to the XPath defined in the XMLObject annotation of the class the annotated field belongs to.

Author:
Alex Gilleran

Required Element Summary
 String value
          The XPath of the field, as a String.
 
Optional Element Summary
 String dateFormat
          The format to use for parsing this field, if it's a date - in the same format as is used for SimpleDateFormat.
 

Element Detail

value

public abstract String value
The XPath of the field, as a String.

dateFormat

public abstract String dateFormat
The format to use for parsing this field, if it's a date - in the same format as is used for SimpleDateFormat. Defaults to ISO date (yyyy-MM-dd).

Default:
"yyyy-MM-dd"
